device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<ProviderFrame xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="N510_general.xsd"> <Provider> <MAC_ADDRESS value="%%mac_address%%"/> <PROFILE_NAME class="string" value="%%mac_address%%.xml"/>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### General Device Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<!-- Needed to enable Provisioning, After Reboot --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data.ucB_AUTO_UPDATE_PROFILE" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data3.ucI_ONESHOT_PROVISIONING_MODE_1" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/>
<!-- Allow access from other networks. --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_ACCEPT_FOREIGN_SUBNET" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/>
<!-- Advanced VoIP settings -->
<SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_USE_RANDOM_PORT" class="symb_item" value="0x0"/> {IF network=REMOTESTUN} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_LOCAL_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%phonesipport%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RTP_LOCAL_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%rtp_port_min%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RTP_LOCAL_PORT_MAX" class="symb_item" value="%%rtp_port_max%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_LOCAL_PORT" class="symb_item" value="5060"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RTP_LOCAL_PORT" class="symb_item" value="5004"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RTP_LOCAL_PORT_MAX" class="symb_item" value="5020"/> {ENDIF}
<!-- General SIP Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_DTMF_TX_MODE_BITS" class="symb_item" value='"2"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_DTMF_TX_MODE_AUTO" class="symb_item" value='"0"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_TRANSPORT_LAYER" class="symb_item" value="17"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_TRANSPORT_LAYER_2" class="symb_item" value="17"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_TRANSPORT_LAYER_3" class="symb_item" value="17"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_TRANSPORT_LAYER_4" class="symb_item" value="17"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_TRANSPORT_LAYER_5" class="symb_item" value="17"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_TRANSPORT_LAYER_6" class="symb_item" value="17"/>
<!-- Transfer Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_ATTENDED_CALL_TRANS_HOLD_TARGET" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_UNATTENDED_CALL_TRANS_HOLD_TARGET" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_CUSTOM.bit.bMusicOnHoldCap" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_USE_R_KEY_FOR_CALL_TRANSFER" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_CUSTOM_ORG.bit.bEct" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_CT_AFTER_ON_HOOK" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/>
<!-- Time and DST Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_TIME_NTP_SERVER[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%param::time_ntp_server%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_TIME_USE_AUTOMATIC_DST" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_TIME_USE_AUTOMATIC_NTP_SYN" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/>
<!-- Codec Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_CODEC_PREFERENCES" class="symb_item" value="0"/>
<!-- WEB UI: Settings - Management - Local Settings - Select Country optimum setting for behind other platformen is "Other country"--> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_DIALING_PLAN_COUNTRY_ID" class="symb_item" value="0xff"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_CUSTOM_ORG.aucInternationalPrefix" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_CUSTOM_ORG.aucCountryCode" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_CUSTOM_ORG.aucNationalPrefix" class="symb_item" value='""'/>
<!-- HS assignment Handset 1 connected to SIP account 1, Handset 2 connected to SIP account 2, .. --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[0].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[0].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[0].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[1].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x2"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[1].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x2"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[1].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[2].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x4"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[2].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x4"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[2].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[3].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x8"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[3].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x8"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[3].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[4].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x10"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[4].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x10"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[4].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[5].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x20"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[5].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x20"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[5].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[6].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x0"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[6].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x0"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[6].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[7].uiSendMask" class="symb_item" value="0x0"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[7].uiReceiveMask" class="symb_item" value="0x0"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[7].ucState" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/>
<!-- LAN --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data3.aucS_NETWORK_DEVICENAME" class="symb_item" value='"gigaset-N510"'/>
<!-- WEB UI: Settings - Management - Local Settings - Tone Selection International=0, US=1, CH=2, AUS=4, ES=6, FR=7, UK=8, NL=9, PL=10, Russia=11, DE=12, IT=13 --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_AE_SwConfig.ucCountryCodeTone" class="symb_item" value="%%toneset.tone%%"/>
<!-- Http language of the device English=0x1,German=0x2,Spanish=0x4,Italian=0x7,French=0x9,Dutch=0xa,Turkish=0x10,Polski=0x11 --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_HTTPLANGUAGE" class="symb_item" value="%%langwebUI%%"/>
<!-- Autoprovisioning - Preference - Time Zone: 0x00(GMT-12),0x01(GMT-11),0x02(GMT-10),0x03(GMT-9),0x04(GMT-8),0x07(GMT-7),0x09(GMT-6),0x0d(GMT-5),0x0f(GMT-4),0x15(GMT-3),0x16(GMT-2), 0x18(GMT-1),0x1a(GMT),0x1b(GMT+1),0x20(GMT+2),0x28(GMT+3),0x2b(GMT+4),0x2e(GMT+5),0x33(GMT+6),0x37(GMT+7),0x3a(GMT+8),0x3d(GMT+9),0x43(GMT+10) --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_TIME_TIMEZONE" class="symb_item" value="%%TimeZoneName%%"/>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### Server Account 1 Settings ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_ACCOUNT_NAME_1" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_01%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_ACCOUNT_IS_ACTIVE_1" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_01_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_AE_Subscriber.stMtDat[0].aucTlnName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_01%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[0].aucAccountName[0]" class='"%%ext_int_num_01%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_USER_ID" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_01%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data3.aucS_SIP_LOGIN_ID" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_id_01%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_PASSWORD" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_pw_01%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DISPLAYNAME" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_last_name_01%%"'/>
<!-- SIP 1Settings --> {IF network=SBC} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DOMAIN" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_SERVER" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_SERVER_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%local_sbc_port%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_REGISTRAR" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_REGISTRAR_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%local_sbc_port%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DOMAIN" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_SERVER" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_SERVER_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_REGISTRAR" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_REGISTRAR_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> {ENDIF} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RE_REGISTRATION_TIMER" class="symb_item" value="180"/>
<!-- STUN Settings --> {IF network=REMOTESTUN} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_USE_STUN" class="symb_item" value="0x1"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_STUN_SERVER" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_STUN_SERVER_PORT" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_USE_STUN" class="symb_item" value="0x0"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_STUN_SERVER" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_STUN_SERVER_PORT" class="symb_item" value="3478"/> {ENDIF} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RE_STUN_TIMER" class="symb_item" value="240"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_NAT_REFRESH_TIME" class="symb_item" value="20"/>
<!-- SPM Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_OUTBOUND_PROXY_MODE" class="symb_item" value="0x2"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_OUTBOUND_PROXY" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_OUTBOUND_PROXY_PORT" class="symb_item" value="5060"/>
<!-- Vbox Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_VOIP_NET_AM_ENABLED_1" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_01_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_VOIP_NET_AM_NUMBER_1" class="symb_item" value='"%%vm_number%%"'/>
<!-- Codec Order --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_VOCODER" class="symb_item" value="%%codec1%%,%%codec2%%,%%codec3%%,%%codec4%%"/>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 2 (idx="2") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_ACCOUNT_NAME_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_02%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_ACCOUNT_IS_ACTIVE_2" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_02_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_AE_Subscriber.stMtDat[1].aucTlnName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_02%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[1].aucAccountName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_02%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_USER_ID_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_02%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data3.aucS_SIP_LOGIN_ID_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_id_02%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_PASSWORD_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_pw_02%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DISPLAYNAME_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_last_name_02%%"'/>
<!-- SIP 2 Settings --> {IF network=SBC} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DOMAIN_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_SERVER_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_SERVER_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="%%local_sbc_port%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_REGISTRAR_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_REGISTRAR_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="%%local_sbc_port%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DOMAIN_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_SERVER_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_SERVER_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_REGISTRAR_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_REGISTRAR_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> {ENDIF} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RE_REGISTRATION_TIMER_2" class="symb_item" value="180"/>
<!-- STUN Settings --> {IF network=REMOTESTUN} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_USE_STUN_2" class="symb_item" value='"0x1"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_STUN_SERVER_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_STUN_SERVER_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_USE_STUN_2" class="symb_item" value='"0x0"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_STUN_SERVER_2" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_STUN_SERVER_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="3478"/> {ENDIF} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RE_STUN_TIMER_2" class="symb_item" value="240"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_NAT_REFRESH_TIME_2" class="symb_item" value="20"/>
<!-- SPM Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_OUTBOUND_PROXY_MODE_2" class="symb_item" value="0x2"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_OUTBOUND_PROXY_2" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_OUTBOUND_PROXY_PORT_2" class="symb_item" value="5060"/>
<!-- Vbox Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_VOIP_NET_AM_ENABLED_2" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_02_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_VOIP_NET_AM_NUMBER_2" class="symb_item" value='"%%vm_number%%"'/>
<!-- Codec Order --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_VOCODER_2" class="symb_item" value="%%codec1%%,%%codec2%%,%%codec3%%,%%codec4%%"/>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 3 (idx="3") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_ACCOUNT_NAME_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_03%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_ACCOUNT_IS_ACTIVE_3" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_03_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_AE_Subscriber.stMtDat[2].aucTlnName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_03%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[2].aucAccountName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_03%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_USER_ID_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_03%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data3.aucS_SIP_LOGIN_ID_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_id_03%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_PASSWORD_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_pw_03%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DISPLAYNAME_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_last_name_03%%"'/>
<!-- SIP 3 Settings --> {IF network=SBC} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DOMAIN_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_SERVER_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_SERVER_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="%%local_sbc_port%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_REGISTRAR_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%local_sbc_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_REGISTRAR_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="%%local_sbc_port%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DOMAIN_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_SERVER_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_SERVER_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_REGISTRAR_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_SIP_REGISTRAR_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> {ENDIF}
<SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RE_REGISTRATION_TIMER_3" class="symb_item" value="180"/>
<!-- STUN Settings --> {IF network=REMOTESTUN} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_USE_STUN_3" class="symb_item" value='"0x1"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_STUN_SERVER_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%pbx_ip%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_STUN_SERVER_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="%%param::sipport%%"/> {ELSE} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_USE_STUN_3" class="symb_item" value='"0x0"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_STUN_SERVER_3" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_STUN_SERVER_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="3478"/> {ENDIF} <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_RE_STUN_TIMER_3" class="symb_item" value="240"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_NAT_REFRESH_TIME_3" class="symb_item" value="20"/>
<!-- SPM Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_OUTBOUND_PROXY_MODE_3" class="symb_item" value="0x2"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_OUTBOUND_PROXY_3" class="symb_item" value='""'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.uiI_OUTBOUND_PROXY_PORT_3" class="symb_item" value="5060"/>
<!-- Vbox Settings --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_VOIP_NET_AM_ENABLED_3" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_03_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_VOIP_NET_AM_NUMBER_3" class="symb_item" value='"%%vm_number%%"'/>
<!-- Codec Order --> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucI_SIP_PREFERRED_VOCODER_3" class="symb_item" value="%%codec1%%,%%codec2%%,%%codec3%%,%%codec4%%"/>
<!--########################################################--> <!--### SIP Settings for Identity 4 (idx="4") ###--> <!--########################################################-->
<SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_ACCOUNT_NAME_4" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_04%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.ucB_SIP_ACCOUNT_IS_ACTIVE_4" class="symb_item" value="%%ext_04_enabled%%"/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_AE_Subscriber.stMtDat[3].aucTlnName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_04%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_Accounts.astAccounts[3].aucAccountName[0]" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_04%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_USER_ID_4" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_int_num_04%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data3.aucS_SIP_LOGIN_ID_4" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_id_04%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_PASSWORD_4" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_auth_pw_04%%"'/> <SYMB_ITEM ID="BS_IP_Data1.aucS_SIP_DISPLAYNAME_4" class="symb_item" value='"%%ext_last_name_04%%"'/>
